mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_myplant_statistics (myplant_id, temperature, humidity, illumination, soil_moisture, sensing_time) VALUES (#{myplant_id}, #{temperature}, #{humidity}, #{illumination}, #{soil_moisture}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tbl_myplant_statistics WHERE myplant_id = #{myplant_id} ORDER BY sensing_time DESC
